messages.message:
i tried to ask Search for a complete list of all software engineering questions we have, and it didn’t do a great job

it seemed to repeat info from 1 or 2 docs, but it wouldn’t summarize info from all relevant docs

is there a max number of docs that a search query can reference?

@Serena Your assumption is right! We do not do exhaustive search yet i.e. questions that require aggregation/composition of data from large set of docs. This is planned in Q3, the KG approach (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C06JCLSTLAW/p1722333860412769) is going to help here! Using "Multistep" might improve the results here but will be exhaustive!
